messages.name: HV_FLASH
messages.description: Start or stop the actual flash procedure, need a request first
messages.comment: [LEGACY]: Equivalent of HV_JMP_TO_BLT - starts firmware update

messages.description: Message used by openblt to send data TO the microcontroller

messages.name: STEERING_WHEEL_VERSION
messages.description: Steering wheel version: build-time timestamp and canlib build-time timestamp

messages.name: ECU_VERSION
messages.description: Ecu version: build-time timestamp and canlib build-time timestamp

messages.name: LV_VERSION
messages.description: Telemetry version: build-time timestamp and canlib build-time timestamp

messages.name: TLM_VERSION
messages.description: Telemetry version: build-time timestamp and canlib build-time timestamp

messages.name: HV_MAINBOARD_VERSION
messages.description: Hv mainboard version: build-time timestamp and canlib build-time timestamp

messages.name: HV_CELLBOARD_VERSION
messages.description: High-Voltage cellboard version: build-time timestamp and canlib build-time timestamp

component_build_time.comment: The build time is expressed in seconds with the 3 least significant bits truncated to fit into the CAN payload

messages.name: HV_ERRORS
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Mainboard errors

messages.name: HV_DEBUG_SIGNALS
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Mainboard debug signals

messages.name: HV_FANS_STATUS
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Status of the fans

messages.name: HV_SET_FANS_STATUS
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Set the status of the fans

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_STATUS
messages.description: Status of all the BMS HV feedbacks
messages.comment: [LEGACY]: Some fields added for legacy reasons

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_TS_VOLTAGE
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Feedback TS voltage

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_MISC_VOLTAGE
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Feedback MISC voltage

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_SD_VOLTAGE
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Feedback SD voltage

messages.name: HV_IMD_STATUS
messages.description: Internal status of the IMD
messages.comment: [LEGACY]: Some fields added for legacy reasons

messages.name: HV_STATUS
messages.description: Mainboard and cellboard internal FSM status

messages.name: HV_SET_STATUS_ECU
messages.comment: [LEGACY]: Some fields added for legacy reasons

messages.name: HV_SET_STATUS_HANDCART
messages.description: Change the mainboard status from the handcart
messages.comment: [LEGACY]: Some fields added for legacy reasons

messages.name: HV_BALANCING_STATUS
messages.comment: [LEGACY]: Some fields added for legacy reasons

messages.name: HV_SET_BALANCING_STATUS
messages.description: Start or stop the balancing procedure
messages.comment: [LEGACY]: Some fields added for legacy reasons

threshold.comment: The maximum allowed delta between the highest and lowest cell voltages in V

messages.name: CONTROL_OUTPUT
messages.description: Torques and signals calculated by the controls algorithms

messages.name: CONTROL_STATUS
messages.description: Power maps used by the control algorithm. (ECU checks if are coherent with the ones in the ECU)

messages.name: HV_CURRENT
messages.description: Mainboard current in A

current.comment: The current sensor has a resolution of +/-10mA

messages.name: HV_POWER
messages.description: Mainboard power in kW

messages.name: HV_ENERGY
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Energy of the HV battery pack

messages.name: HV_TOTAL_VOLTAGE
messages.description: [LEGACY]: mainboard TS voltage

messages.name: HV_CELLS_VOLTAGE
messages.description: HV cells voltages in V

offset.comment: Offset from the first cell of the segment

messages.name: HV_CELLS_VOLTAGE_STATS
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Cellboard cells voltages statistics

messages.name: HV_CELLS_TEMP
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Cellboard cells temperature

messages.name: HV_CELLS_TEMP_STATS
messages.description: [LEGACY]: Cellboard cells temperature statistics

messages.name: HV_FLASH_REQUEST
messages.description: Flash procedure request for a single board of the High-Voltage BMS

messages.name: HV_FLASH_RESPONSE
messages.description: Reponse to a flash request

messages.name: HV_TS_VOLTAGE
messages.description: Voltage present on the tractive system in V

ts.comment: Voltage of the Tractive System of the car in V

pack.comment: Total voltage of the BMS in V

cells_sum.comment: Sum of all the cells voltages of the BMS in V

messages.name: HV_CELLS_TEMPERATURE
messages.description: HV cells temperatures in C

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_DIGITAL
messages.description: Values of the BMS HV digital feedbacks

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_ANALOG
messages.description: Voltages of the BMS HV analog feedbacks

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_ANALOG_SD
messages.description: Voltages of the BMS HV analog shutdown circuit feedbacks

messages.name: HV_FEEDBACK_ENZOMMA
messages.description: Info regarding the feedback that did not allow the BMS to go in the TS ON state

messages.name: HV_ERROR
messages.description: Info regarding the error which has occoured
